Plotting

Plotting#

pocomc.plotting.trace(results, labels=None, width=10.0, height=3.0, kde_bins=200)#

Trace plot.

Parameters

  • results (dict) – Result dictionary produced using pocoMC.

  • labels (list or None) – List of parameter names to include in the figure. If labels=None (default) the labels are set automatically.

  • width (float) – Width of figure (default is width=10.0).

  • height (float) – Height of each subplot (default is height=3.0).

  • kde_bins (int) – Number of bins to use for KDE (default is kde_bins=200).

pocomc.plotting.corner(results, labels=None, color='C0', bins=20, range_=None, smooth=None, smooth1d=None, titles=None, show_titles=True, title_quantiles=None, **kwargs)#

Corner plot.

Parameters

results (dict) – Result dictionary produced using pocoMC.
